name.ja: <ruby>捕食植物<rt>プレデター・プランツ</rt></ruby>テッポウリザード
name.zh-CN: 捕食植物 铁炮瓜蜥蜴

text.en: If you control a "Predaplant" or "Starving Venom" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; it becomes DARK until the end of this turn. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Predaplant Lilizard" once per turn.
